name: VON-Dark Gods: Seven Billion Slaves 12"x12" (30x30cm) CD Booklet+Digital Download (Ltd Ed 500)
description:
VON
Dark Gods: Seven Billion Slaves (Full Length Album)
12"x12" (30x30cm) Booklet
Full Length CD
Ltd Ed 500 (1st Pressing)
Extras: 2 Booklet Exclusive A2 Posters (420mm x 594mm/16.54" x 23.39")
Bonus: Digital Downloads
UPC/EAN: 819162011812 
Catalog#: VR LTD0004

Von Records Presents 
DARK GODS: SEVEN BILLION SLAVES 

Summon The Darkness...Dark Gods Will Rise!!! 

In the cold path of darkness, among the dread and pain deep within us, it is the will of the dark ones to enslaves us. Dark Gods manifest around us, beside us, inside us! 

"Seven Billion Slaves" delves deeper into the cold and dark minds of VON. VON's creator and mastermind VENIEN!!! has tapped into his inner psyche and has willingly manifested many dark tales and ruthless hymns for the world's seven billion slaves. "Seven Billion Slaves" is the first of three volumes to begin the trilogy of "Dark Gods". 

*All orders include digital downloads: Dark Gods: Seven Billion Slaves (Full Length Digital Album)

*As an added bonus you will receive a digital download of: Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation (Advance Digital Demo)

(*Big Cartel confirmed purchases of this item will receive digital download within 24hrs with receipt of order)

Band: VON
Title: Dark Gods: Seven Billion Slaves (Full Length Album)
Volume: 1
Format: 12"x12" (30x30cm) Booklet w/Compact Disc
Extras: 2 Booklet Exclusive A2 Posters (420mm x 594mm/16.54" x 23.39") + Digital Album Download
Bonus Item: Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation (Advance Digital Demo)
Edition/Qty: Ltd Ed 500 (1st Pressing)
Manufacturer: Von Records/Pirate Press
Release Date: March 22nd 2013
Illustrations and Design: VENIEN!!!

Tracklisting:
They Have Come
Ancient Flesh of The Dark Gods (Feat. Coffinworm)
Hands of Black Death
Dark Gods
MONSTER!
DevilWhore
iAmInHuMan
RawRot
Black Eyes

*Full Album Stream available @ www.VONBLACKMETAL.com

name: VON-Satanic Blood 12"x12" (30x30cm) CD Booklet+Digital Download (Ltd Ed 500)
description:
VON
Satanic Blood (Full Length Album)
12"x12" (30x30cm) Booklet
Full Length CD
Ltd Ed 500 (1st Pressing)
Bonus Digital Download
UPC/EAN: 819162010938
Catalog#: VR LTD0003

Von Records Presents
SATANIC BLOOD

The long awaited official album from VON debuts after 20+ years! The wait is finally over! VON creator "Venien" entered the Von Records studio "THE PIT" to record 19 classic songs from the incubation period, the "Demo Years" of VON.

Satanic Blood Full Length Album comes available in a 12"x12" (30x30 cm) 20pg booklet w/mounted CD inside the back cover. CD includes 19 tracks with songs like: Satanic Blood, Watain, Jesus Stain, Devil Pig, Veadtuck, and 2 CD Booklet exclusive bonus tracks Satan and Litanies of Von. The included booklet contains 17 illustrated images by VON creator VENIEN!!! himself. Also included are full lyric sheets and liner notes.

*All orders include digital download: Satanic Blood (Full Length Digital Album)

***DIGITAL BONUS***
Download the digital album and receive 25!!! additional bonus tracks taken from the rare 1990 demo Satanic and the 1992 demos Satanic Blood and Blood Angel +  limited edition Satanic Blood 7" Vinyl EP from 2010 + original demo cassette tape sleeves and covers

(*Big Cartel confirmed purchases of this item will receive digital download code within 24hrs or less of receipt of order)

Band: VON
Title: Satanic Blood (Full Length Album)
Format: 12"x12" (30x30cm) Booklet w/Compact Disc
Extras: Digital Album *Free Download Code included
Edition/Qty: Ltd Ed 500 (1st Pressing)
Manufacturer: Von Records/Pirate Press
Release Date: October 31st 2012
Illustrations and Design: VENIEN!!!

Tracklisting:
Jesus Stain
Devil Pig
Venien
Release
Veadtuck
Vennt
Evisc
Goat Christ
Dissection InHuman
Chalice of Blood
Blood Von
Christfire
Backskin
Watain
Blood Angel
Lamb
Satanic Blood
Satan (*Bonus CD Track ONLY)
Litanies of Von (*Bonus CD Track ONLY)

*Bonus Tracks not included on digital album

*Advance Streams of songs taken from Satanic Blood are available @ www.VONBLACKMETAL.com

name: VENIEN!!!-Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation (Advance Digital Demo+7" Vinyl EP) (Ltd Ed Set 100)
description:
VENIEN!!!
Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation (Advance Digital Demo)
Ltd Ed Set 100
Catalog#: VR D0008
Bonus: Tribal Blood 7" Vinyl 2010 EP (Catalog#: VR LTD0002)

Von Records Presents
TRIBAL BLOOD: RITUAL MANIFESTATION

Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation includes demo recordings from upcoming songs inside the upcoming double full length solo VENIEN!!! album titled Tribal Blood. VON founder, Jason "VENIEN!!!" Ventura began recording the Tribal Blood demos to expose the brutal psychosis and twisted persona of VENIEN!!!

Von Records Presents: Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation (Advance Digital Demo)

Artist: VENIEN!!!
Project: Tribal Blood
Album Title: Tribal Blood: Rituals Manifestation
Length: Advance Demo

Tracklisting:
Black Coming of VENIEN!!! (Demo)
REVOLT! (Demo)
God Is Dead (Demo)
Inssside Wittthhh Usss (Demo)

Digital Bonus Tracks:
Tribal Blood (602nd Regiment "Cheeto AZ Fvk" Digital Rough 2009 Demo)
Tribal Blood (7" Vinyl EP 2010 Version)
Tribal Blood (7" Vinyl EP 2010 Instrumental Version)
Tribal Blood (7" Vinyl EP 2010 Acapella Version)

*All orders include digital download: Tribal Blood: Ritual Manifestation (Advance Digital Demo)

(*Big Cartel confirmed purchases of this item will receive digital download code within 24hrs or less of receipt of order)

*Advance Streams of REVOLT! & God Is Dead are available @ www.TRIBALBLOOD.com
